aliquot_id: ID for this aliquot. Must be unique within a biosample
biosample_id: ECHO_BIOSAMPLE_ID of the biosample that spawned this aliquot
creation_date: The date at which this aliquot was created
num_cells: If applicable, the number of cells (in millions)
transfer: T|F, was this aliquot sent to another lab?
sender: If transfer, who sent this aliquot?
receiver: If transfer, who received this aliquot?
